content: knitted jumper for drops soft tweed the piece is worked top down with raglan split in the sides and ribbed edges sizes xs - xxl pattern no st-009 yarn group b **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops soft tweed from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-400-450-500-550-600 g colour 18 carrot cake drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 60-60-60-80-80-80 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 60-60-60-80-80-80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
